attributes.action: Abolish the welfare state for people of working age, redistribute some of the benefit to the elderly and genuinely disabled.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The welfare state of this country is a joke. With millions of pounds going directly to foreign bank accounts. Billions of tax pounds going to support lazy people that have no intention of ever working whilst our elderly struggle to heat or eat. It's time to save our money Mr Campbell and give it to those who genuinely need it.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
